column4: I was here a little while ago. Basically, my computer is reading my Ubuntu partition as a windows partition and can't find the "windows startup file." I installed it via Wubi from my windows 7 desktop. I've also tried installing from the LiveCD with the same result.
I'm new to this. Define grub, please.
I don't get that. I basically get a message telling me to repair via the windows boot CD.
The error code is 0xc00000e if it's of interest to you
I probably can, but you'll have to tell me how to do it.
